name: Expert Rifleman - Reloaded
description: Expert Rifleman is the first 3D ballistics simulator available to the general consumer. It includes a full featured ballistics calculator allowing the simulation of any type of ammunition.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB graphics card, Monitor resolution: 1024 x 768 DirectX: Version 9.0b Storage: 1200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7+ Graphics: 512 MB graphics card, Monitor resolution: 1920 x 1080 or higher

reviews.review_text: Not really a game but a long range shooting simulation.   - running the app inside wine works great, mouse movement could use improvement but works.   - Can be considered as 'working with Linux'.  - A bit on the pricey side but still less expensive than similar apps. - seems accurate.  Recommended to anyone who wants to improve his skills on the reticle without spending money on ammo and range-time.
